description:
Lyle is a super-friendly personal trainer.

He was showing us all kinds of exercises that he likes to do with his clients. He even had one move I hadn't seen before — push-ups where he claps his hands BEHIND his back!

Lyle has a really sexy chest and nice arms. He has fairly light skin with contrasting dark hair, which he attributes to his partial Native American ancestry.

We took him to the beach, which was deserted because it was the middle of "winter." One of our camera guys dared him to get naked and run into the ocean, which he did. The water must have been cold as ice, but he has a really relaxed attitude about everything and didn't seem to mind!

He really enjoyed his time out on the sand, but he was anxious to rub one out. He loves to play with balls.

"It helps me get off," he said...
title: Lyle
